Description: Ostracon on dish carved from limestone; inscription on the rim, the third line of the inscription inside the dish.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Naukratis, just west of the sanctuary of Aphrodite
Curator's comments: Bernand calls the piece a disk, but Gardner describes it as a dish with a rim.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (744-5, no. 5)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BC.13)
